modName: A Less Friendly Dirge and Maul
summary: enhanced dirge and maul in riften.
descriptionHtml:
To make Dirge and Maul look a bit more intimatating than before I:

1) Changed their races(depends on which version you download).
2) Increased their levels to 20.
3) Gave them daedric armor.

Please tell me what you think about it in the comments.
author: defcon05

files.name: Unfriendly Dirge and Maul dark elf version
files.fileName: Unfriendly Dirge and Maul dark elf version-24629-1.rar
